# Request for Standing Offer – Workshop Delivery for the Indigenous Community Safety Development Contribution Program

**Procurement Notice**

## Background

Public Safety Canada (PS) is seeking Standing Offers (SO) for on an “as and when required” basis from Contractors and Consultants to provide workshop delivery services for the Indigenous Community Safety Development Contribution Program.

## Objective

The primary objective of this Standing Offer is to support eligible Indigenous communities in Canada through the Community Safety Planning process.

## Scope of Work

The Contractor will provide on-site facilitation services for three planning stages:

1. Community Building
2. Action Planning
3. Community Mobilization

The Contractor will:

* Deliver the Community Safety Planning (CSP) program
* Coach and mentor the community's Core Group throughout the process

## Mandatory Requirement for Indigenous Businesses only

This Standing Offer is set aside under the Mandatory Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses. ONLY Indigenous Businesses may submit a Standing Offer for this requirement.

## Location

The scope of work will be across Canada, with a focus on the following regions:

* Manitoba
* Saskatchewan
* Alberta
* British Columbia
* Northwest Territories
* Yukon

## Work Period

The initial offering period for this Standing Offer is one year, commencing on May 31, 2023. There is an option to extend the Standing Offer for a one-year period, renewable upon no less than 30 days' written notice.

## Security Clearance

No security clearance is required for this Standing Offer.

## Contact

For additional information and to submit a Standing Offer:

* Name: Jessica Evans
* Email: contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 219-4601

## Attachments

For full details about this Standing Offer, refer to the following attachments:

* PSIRF – Request for Standing Offer – Community Safety Planning
* Bidders’ Guide
* Amendment 1

Please note that the Optional Offeror Engagement Session for this Standing Offer will take place on March 24, 2023, at 1:30 PM (EDT).  If you wish to participate, please indicate your interest by accepting the invitation that will be sent separately. If you do not receive the invitation by March 20, please contact contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca.  Please note that SE registration is not required for this event. We appreciate your interest in this Standing Offer and look forward to receiving your proposal.  If you need any further clarification or information, feel free to Contact us.
